alert_handler module

Alert handler module for sending alerts via multiple channels (Telegram, console, file).

class alert_handler.Alert(timestamp: str, attack_type: str, severity: str, confidence: float, flow_key: str, src_ip: str, dst_ip: str, src_port: int, dst_port: int, protocol: str, packet_length: int, additional_info: Dict[str, Any], telegram_sent: bool = False, console_displayed: bool = False, logged_to_file: bool = False)[source]
